summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Shoreline Street End permits, and skybridge and other structure term permits; amending the current Seattle Department of Transportation Street Use Fee Schedule, Exhibit A to Ordinance 122295, by amending the Shoreline Street End permit fee methodology, adopting a term permit schedule of fees, and establishing a term permit fee methodology; repealing Section 1 and Attachment A of Ordinance 119673 Shoreline Street End Permit Fee Methodology; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
note: Originally referred to Transportation Committee on 9/13/10
